_header: Thy joy be ilke a deal to serve thy god to pay
_description: Richard Rolle, an exhortation to love Jesus — twelve monorhyming quatrains with medial rhyme.

CULDd564.First Lines:
[t]Hy ioy be ilk a dele to serue þi god to payffor al þis
                    worldes wele þu sees wytes a wayþow fande his lufe to
                    fele þt last with þe will ayAnd þi kare sal kele
                    þi pyne turne þe to play…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Ioy in þi brest es bredde when þu ert hym
                    lufandþi sawle þand hase he fedde in swete lufe brennandAl
                    vanites forsake if þu hys lufe wil fele et ceteraut
                    supra
CULDd564.Note:
Follows the explict for R. Hampole, top of f. 42: ‘Expliciunt
                        cantica diuini amoris secundum Ricardum Hampole’. This is then
                    followed by the heading for 3730: ‘Item secundum eundem
                    Ricardum’.
